title: Earnest Gray
text:
Earnest L. Gray (born March 2, 1957) is a former <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="wide%20receiver">wide receiver</a> in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a> who played for the <a href="New%20York%20Giants">New York Giants</a> and <a href="St.%20Louis%20Cardinals%20%28NFL%29">St. Louis Cardinals</a>. He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Memphis">University of Memphis</a> and was <a href="NFL%20draft">drafted</a> by the Giants in the second round of the <a href="1979%20NFL%20Draft">1979 NFL Draft</a>. He caught 78 passes for 1,139 yards and five touchdowns in 1983.<a href="https%3A//web.archive.org/web/20100212002644/http%3A//databasefootball.com/players/playerpage.htm%3Filkid%3DGRAYEAR01"></a>
He played on a Giants team that in 1981 made the playoffs after a 18-year hiatus. He finished his career with 246 receptions for 3,790 yards and 27 touchdowns.
